name: Steal His Look
one_liner: A meme format that breaks down a character's outfit into absurdly expensive or impossible components.
meaning: Poking fun at high-fashion 'lookbooks' by applying the same logic to weird or fictional characters.
remix_rules: Mix of real brands and fake concepts
example_lines: Steal the look, five bands for the dirty sneakers
Price tag on the vibe, you can't afford the aura
